_field_real.name: Length #Length of illumination animation in seconds.

_field_string_id.name: Next State #Used to automatically transition to another state when finished.

_field_struct.name: Intensity #Animates intensity over time. 0 - Min Intensity. 1 - Max Intensity
Color #Animates color over time. 0 - White. 1 - Full Color
Activation #Animates On/Off state over time. 0 - Off. 1 - On
